properties.areaDesc: S of Cape Lookout NC to Surf City NC out to 20 nm; S of Ocracoke Inlet NC to Cape Lookout NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued February 11 at 2:17PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
Areas of fog, with patchy areas of visibilities below 1 nm, will
persist over the southern coastal waters for the next few hours.
Fog is expected to lift before sunset as winds increase ahead of
an approaching front.

Mariners should be prepared for abrupt changes in visibility. If
you must navigate, proceed with caution. Use proper fog signals.
Make sure all running lights are on. Remember to use your radar
and compass.

NWSheadline: PATCHY DENSE FOG WILL CONTINUE FOR THE NEXT COUPLE OF HOURS
